p: Flowering phenology and pollen:ovule ratio of S. maritima were studied since previous field observations suggested they may change considerably between years depending on changing environmental conditions. The duration of the flowering period of S. maritima was evaluated for 20 tussocks during a warm flowering period in 2017 (mean temperature 24.1 ± 1.7°C and maximum temperature 30.6 ± 2.1°C for May–July) and for five tussocks during a mild flowering period in 2018 (mean temperature 21.4 ± 1.6°C and maximum temperature 27.2 ± 1.7°C for May–July) in Odiel Marshes. Information on the duration of the flowering period of S. densiflora was obtained from Valdes et al. (1987) and Castillo and Figueroa (2009a).
